text: "Bonfire Heart" is a 2013 song by James Blunt and is the lead single from his fourth studio album Moon Landing. It topped the single charts in Austria, Germany and Switzerland. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Hungary, number 8 in New Zealand, number 9 in Italy, number 13 in Ireland, number 15 in Belgium (Wallonia) and Poland, number 22 in Belgium (Flanders) and number 26 in France. == References == Category:2013 songs Category:James Blunt songs
title: Bonfire Heart
